channel.title: Extremely Urgent 508 Client/Server problem
channel.description:
Ok so, out of nowhere today every 508 server and client will not work. I tried using multiple servers with multiple clients and the client just gets this error every time I try to login. It loads fine but then when I log in it gets this error in the client console every time!!
Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1: 156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
HELP PLEASE!!

item.title: Extremely Urgent 508 Client/Server problem
item.dc:creator: @OwnerClay OwnerClay
